property.label: URL of the audio
property.name: audioUrl
property.description: Provide the url of the audio file to play.

property.label: Default volume
property.name: currentVolume
property.description: Provide the default volume level to load. The value must be between 0 and 1 with 0.1 as difference.

property.label: Show volume bar?
property.name: showVolumeBar
property.description: Select if you want to show the volume bar.

property.label: Enable browser-level logging?
property.name: enableLogging
property.description: Select if you want to log component data in broswer console. (Feature for developers)

property.label: Salesforce icon name
property.name: avatarIcon
property.description: Icon that loads in case avatar url does not render any image.

property.label: Icon url
property.name: avatarUrl
property.description: If you want to load an image as an icon.

property.label: Icon container
property.name: avatarVariant
property.description: The type of container for icon. The allowed values are circle and square

property.label: Player title
property.name: title
property.description: Title to render at the top.
